content.detailedDescription: I first noticed cloud-like straight lines in the sky, perfectly spaced apart like a grid. i was at work at this time. when i got off about an hour later i drove a couple of miles, not only were there still there, but there were intersections. i was going to my friends house in another town, at least 15 miles away and the whole way the clouds/lines stretched across the sky. when i arrived at his house i caught glimpse of a solid black triangular object with smoke pumping out the back of it. i watched it for a little while, and managed to get videos and pictures of the whole phenomenon on my ipod. as i was on my way back home i saw a perfect circle in the sky in between two of the lines, and it was massive.
content.summary: Black triangle pumping out smoke that went on for miles.

content.detailedDescription:
In mid-august at about 9:20 in the evening i got into my car and began driving home from a restaurant along the lakeshore. (lake superior) there is a road along the lower harbor and i was facing north. i looked up to see the sky and saw a large, long craft moving very slowly over marquette michigan's downtown area. i didn't see any lights on the craft, but i clearly saw it silhouetted, or backlit by the sunset's afterglow. the sky was still bright and golden. it was headed ne and moved ot of my sight over the treetops.

i was very excited  when i saw it and knew it could not possibly be a plane or jet. it was so huge and moved so very slowly and at such a low altitude.

i was undecided as to what to do next. should i hurry up to higher ground and try to see it some more? or perhaps turn around and reverse my direction in order to have a view  of the craft over presque isle and above the lake?

what i did instead was drive to my home and call the police to report the sighting. the officer did not make me feel silly and took the information. my assumption was that since the very large ufo moved right over marquette, that they would have hundreds of calls from residents who also saw it. but no one else reported seeing a ufo that evening. i guess i might have been the only person who did observe the ufo.
content.summary: While driving i saw a large ufo moving slowly over downtown marquette, mi

content.detailedDescription: I was camping at my ranch me and a friend made small fire.I looked up to see stars that when i noticed to triangl ,it looked like jets  but it stoped as a singl ship an shot down fast i have never been more scard it was tirfing then it left.I did not remeber for 8yrs.
content.summary: I saw triangel lights i flash it with flash light it stoped desende then left ,8yrs later i remeberd aswell my friend

content.detailedDescription: We were so far up in the mountains and we were lost during a snow storm, looking for a friends house that my wife was at because she became snow in and you couldn't drive down the road that my f,fiend lived so we parked out on the main road and started walking down every road looking for the house, or a house with lights on  and we came to a dead end  with snow piled high at the end, that when we seen the three triangle lights hovering i got a sense that seen us, cues we were crouched behind the snow bank, and it moved towards us in a way that if you blinked it was 50 ft closer that's when i decided to stand up and walk away and gave my friend my pocket knife and opened it and told him not to look back until we were out sight and around the corner and started to run the brightness of this light was like construction lights like they use to work on the roads at night but we were so far up in the mountains and on a snow cover diirt road on a night that was a blizzard  there absolutely was no road construction going at that time of night  i got a sense that they seen us i could here them in my mind it felt like,that's what scared me and made run
content.summary: Three triangles  hovering 5 ft above the ground we walked up on it my accident i got a sense that  it seen us it moved towards in a way that when you blinked it was cooler every time that's what freighted us.When turned and walked away slowly wi

content.detailedDescription: It was 7:30pm, november 19, 2012. i was on the way home after taking my grandmother to the hospital. i was coming down off the exit ramp and noticed an orange sphere in the sky. i stopped right there, on the exit ramp, in the middle of the road staring at the object. my aunt was also with us. i know that both she and i saw it. i'm not sure if my grandma would remember as she has early onset of dementia. i pulled off to a lot right beside the ramp and got out of the car. i stood there for 10 minutes as i watched the fireball move up and down. it would disappear and reappear. upon the 2nd reappearance a 2nd fireball came down, also moving up and down. one went up and disappeared for good, while the other changed shape into a barely visible triangular object with rounded edges. it spun around like a boomerang and then disappeared. at some point during this experience i called my friend who lived nearby. he and his mother, and his brothers' friend saw it. i thought it was over so i got back into the car and started driving home. i saw it once more in my rear view mirror, so i pulled over and watched it for five more minutes before my grandma started complaining and wanted to go home.
content.summary: 2 fireballs moving up and down, changed shape into triangle with dark/dull lights, spun like a boomerang after change.

content.detailedDescription: I was station on nas jax a navy air station and i was attending my course required by all military personnel who ride motorcycles and just happened to look up at the sky due to a incident i had years before that caused me to become a sky watcher now, and noticed a silver sphere looked similar to a be be or ball bearing maybe even a oval or cylinder like.  i didn't want to seem weird so i didn't make a big deal just watched it close.  at a point we had to all get on the start of the obstacle course on our motorcycles to start the program and when i got to the location where we began, i looked up and the object was gone.  all this was within a 5 min time frame.  i looked up several times at the object which was really high up, but the lack of movement really made me curious about it.
content.summary: Seen a object high up, that looked like a silver be-be for a be be gun just not moving just sitting in same spot.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my moms car one night laying across the front seats, i was able to lay across the front seats because she had bench seats in the car.  i noticed a really bright light out the corner of my eye.  the light was extremely bright like the light on a large aircrafts landing gear.  the thing that set it apart aside from being in a very rural town in the middle of no where, was that this light would get extremely bright and pulsate itself out until it was gone.  this went on for about 5 min.  getting really really bright and pulsation/flickering itself almost in steps to a smaller bright ball of light until it completely was not viewable.  after doing this for 5 min, the light became  bright again, not extremely bright as in its peak potential and it seemed as if multi lights came into the play, seemed like red, blue, white, yellow etc, going around in circles.  it did this for about another 5 min and it descended below the tree line.  i never seen it bolt up or anything.  during the time that all this was happening, i was really curious and nervous because i had no explanation for it, especially with me being raised and  brought up on military installations all my life from birth to 17 or 18 and having a passion for aircraft.  i knew it was not a helicopter, airplane, or bump because of the location i was as well as the object or whatever it was not generating any sound whatsoever.  i mean for the periods of time i watched it, it had absolutely no sound just lights.  i was really nervous so once the object went behind the tree line, i got out of the car and ran in the house.
content.summary: I was sitting in my mothers car at around 9 ish, and i noticed a really bright light similar to a airplane landing light but pulsating and disappearing.
Bright red orange glowing ball right over me then it moves in a wavy form away from us with flashing light pattern

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother saw 3 lights hovering past us it changed direction and a jet was chasing after it
content.summary: 3 lights i seen it my mother my witness seen is im freeked out

content.detailedDescription: i took a picture of a military helicopter that had been flying in the area at a high altitude.  after transfering the pictures from my camera to my computer i noticed an object that appeared to be following the helicopter. it appears white in color and oval in shape.  i did not notice the object while taking the picture. another photo taken approximately 2 seconds later did not show the oval object.
content.summary: I took a photo of a military helicopter and did not see anything unusal until i transfered them onto my computer.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the ufo out my window close to 11pm. it appeared as a star first then i realized it was not when it started zig zagging in the sky. up and down, left and right etc. i called a friend who also observed this. i watched this activity take place for over an hour and eventually got too tired to continue. upon checking back maybe 30 minutes after ceasing, it was no longer in the sky. 

the odd thing was that it responded to my mental requests. when i would ask it to go up or down it would. the same happened with left and right movement. the craft appeared very responsive to mental communication and non threatening. i called a friend who also observed this activity with his girlfriend out their window in the city of highlands ranch. 

i have a cell phone video which is very dark, but you can see the craft blinking in and out a little bit. will submit soon.
content.summary: Bright object in sky dances for an hour over castle rock/ sedalia

content.detailedDescription:
I woke to take a pee opened my door and saw two orbs in the sky.At first i thought they may be airplanes on aproach to land but then realized that the balls of light were not planes but in fact some strange type of craft...These two craft moved silently and seemed to be attached to each other in some way at times and at other times they wete seperate from each other.I ran to grab my phone when the objects were about to pass me overhead... i snapped 7photos that originaly i thought the camera was unable to capture the ufos.
only later that day did i realize that there wete images to look at..  when these objects left they did not fly away but simply vanished from the air...Like a lightswitch had turned them off...It should be noted that one of the two craft headed off in the north east direction towards thurston it was this craft that dematerialized first then the one going north dematerialized about four minutes after tje first one...   of course i was stunned and could hardly believe what had just happened.. also there have been multiple sightings of strange craft in the sky in eugene  this month...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed two red colored craft in the sky at 1:22 am after three minutes i ran amd grabbed my phone and took 7 pictures...

content.detailedDescription: During the recording of the message, the phone shuts down and did not restart till the next day...The recording was in tact...We have the clip...However this copy i am attaching was video directly from the orignal phone...The other (orignal is clearer and better)
content.summary: Was observed in the backyard we have a video of it taken from a mobile phone

content.detailedDescription:
Note: menus do not include us virgin islands for location. i entered alabama but that is not correct. use zip 00820 to locate sighting. time is in atlantic standard time, ast (utc-4).

looking up to the southeast in the early evening while the sky was still light, i noticed a small fast-moving object well above the cloud tops, which extended to 7500 feet, with clear blue sky above. i could not see a surface, but the 3 or 4 lights and their sizes indicated a cylindrical object, pointed at the front. the bright lights were in this configuration: small bright whitish-yellow light at the front (direction of travel), then a larger bright green light, then a dark space, and last a whitish-yellow light. though i could not see a surface or object, the lights were very closely-spaced and moved together. i thought it was a plane at first, but the lights were too bright for navigation lights on an aircraft and did not conform to the usual arrangement. i see high-flying jets all the time and have never seen this bright a display from an aircraft before.
i first saw it moving e to w, south of the zenith and about 65��� altitude in the ese. it moved at a constant rate, very fast. i'm an iridium flare and satellite watcher and i've only seen this kind of speed from very low-flying military jets whose structure was completely visible, accompanied by lots of jet noise. this ufo was totally silent, well above the cloud tops and moving in a straight line and what appeared to be a constant altitude to the west. i've never seen anything move this fast at altitude. it did not pulse or strobe, left no trail, made no sound, and was lost to view when it was obscured by the cloud tops.
if it was low (under 10,000'), it was about the size of a jumbo jet fuselage & silent; if it was much higher it was quite big and moving way too fast for a plane.
content.summary: Very fast-moving, closely-spaced lights above the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my lounge chair in front of the large windowed patio doorsin my living room. the entire room was dark so that i could see outside better. there were some clouds in the sky but they were thin. the mooon was bright so not many stars were visible but i could make out a few. i seen just above the horizon what looked like a fireball traveling in a southeast direction and gaining altitude. it ascended like an airplane taking flight only it moved faster. while it was ascending and moving southeast it also pulsated white and reddish-yellow light. it seemed to slow a little then changed from the white, reddish yellow light to a white bluish color then suddenly it shot straight up out of site almost instantly. i was shocked because i thought it was an airplane at first but then when the fireball shot straight up i got up and looked out the door and up into the sky to see if i could see it higher in the sky. i searched the sky for at least a minute but then decided at the speed it ascended i wasn't going to find it. i really need to keep a camera on me at all times. i would love to have a picture of the things i see in the sky.
content.summary: Fireball like, pulsating, white and reddish-yellow light coming from ne heading southeast, but then ascended rapidly up into space until no longer visible.

content.detailedDescription: I was in a parking lot across the street from burger king eating some food. about 20 mins before i started eating, i was driving, left work listening to the radio when i heard a report on kfi-am640 about calls coming in about lights in the sky, then i heard something about a meteor shower. when i saw the lights in the sky i assumed they were meteors. that's when i noticed they were moving slow. i grabbed my phone and began recording. there were 3 (looked like) orbs that were a glowing red/ orange. in the video there are 4 lights that appear. the light on the far left is a star. i thought i could use it as a reference. that's when one of the orbs began disappearing.  then another faded away when i heard a helicopter and looked up and saw another red glowing light. the 4th one then disappeared about 2 mins later. i stayed in the same place for another 10 mins or so looking up but i didn't see anything after that.
content.summary: I noticed 3 orbs slowly flying across the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my bed. my bed was directly against the wall with a window. we could sit in the bed and look out the window and view the sky. i like to keep it dark in my room to be able to see more stars in the sky. two years before on this exact date i had seen spheres going by my window so, since then, i gazed out of my window more often hoping to see something again. it was partly cloudy and to the north there was a thunderstorm or heat lightning with no rain. the moon was full or almost full making the stars more difficult to see. the clouds were moving quickly from  northwest to east but i still gazed up into the sky trying to make out the stars. i had a friend with me who would like to stay anonymus. my friend had just come into the room and sat down with me on the bed it was almost midnight. my friend and i were only looking out of the window a few minutes when the lights which appeared to me to be in a equilateral triangle formation flew over our apartment building past our window in a straight line until it was out of site. it came from the east just like the spheres two years before and followed the same path to the west just as the spheres did. as it traveled over us i noticed it looked as though it was above the clouds but the lights did not disappear like an airplanes lights would if it went behind the clouds. the bluish-white lights shown right through the clouds not losing any of their luminosity. my friend describes the three lights as being spherical in shape and white with a slight pinkish hue. my friend also describes the three lights as being in an isosceles triangle formation. my friend and i both felt excited, afraid and curious. i remember saying while pointing up at the lights, ufo, ufo, ufo, wait, wait, wait. i was thinking i could grab the camera and get a photo but it went out of sight too quickly. neither one of us knew how to report a ufo sighting so we discussed what we saw after we closed the window and pulled the blinds shut. we also decided not to tell anyone until we were both comfortable with people knowing.
content.summary: Me and one other person witnessed three lights in a triangle pattern flying from the east into the west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my house around 9:30 p.M. having a cigarette. after a few minutes, i looked up and saw a huge, bright orange object. so bright, it appeared to be on fire. i called for my husband to look and he saw it too. he called for his nephew who was inside, to bring out his phone for video, at which point my husband ran around to the front of the house. his nephew gave him the phone and he (his nephew) had binoculars. by this time i came back around and that's when it took off south, within 20 seconds, it had dimmed to the size of a pinpoint and then disappeared all together. my husbands heart was beating so fast, you can hear him on the video out of breath.
we felt that we were witnessing a ufo. our nephew, saw it the best through the binoculars and says it looked like a hazy, translucent sphere with a fire at the bottom of it. he was able to sketch it.
we were very very excited by what we saw. we lost sight of the object because it faded into nothing. i hope we were not the only ones who seen it.
content.summary: Outside having a cigarette, looked up and saw a bright orange object. it appeared to be on fire.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the bus stop waiting for my bus looking at the stars when i say the object fly very low over my head. it was very big around like a giant "o" with a triangle in the center holding it together. on the "o" part it had little lights all around it and had a triangle looking center that apered to be dark. in the front it had a pulsing red light. when it flew over it was very low and very quite flying in from the direction of the beach towards inland.
content.summary: Very big circle flying very low with a pulsing red light

content.detailedDescription:
It was early evening summertime between 1967 & 1970. i first heard sirens running from west to east.I thought it might be the forest service as this was their usual route.Several minutes later i heard the fog horn go off signaling the volunteer fimemen there was a fire. i then thought it was a brush fire close to us and the forest service needed our fire department's help. i then went outside to see if i could locate any fires as the foothills were right behind our house.As i went outside i was first looking south over the san gabriel valley as we lived on a hill and saw 2 groups of red round lights with 3 to 5 per group just floating about 500' above i believe to be the south el monte area of the san gabriel valley. i don't know if they were moving much as they were about 10 miles away. i called to my parents to come see what i was looking at. our neighbors also heard me calling my folks and also came out to look. there was about 10 of us watching and wondering what we were looking at for about 10 minutes before they just disappeared one group at a time.
i checked the local paper the next morning to see if there were any articles about the ufo's (or what ever we saw) but didn;t find any. i did find an article on the small brush fire that was in the hills just east of us with an ending of "and ufo's were seen in the area but not believed to have anything to do with the fire." i least i knew someone else had seen something strange.
content.summary: Viewed with neighbors 7 to 10 red round objects hovering about 500' above neighborhood around 10 miles across valley from us.

content.detailedDescription: Since i was a young girl i have always loved to watch the stars. i would try to pick out the constellations. so staring out my bedroom window into the night sky was not new to me. i was sitting at my bedroom window. i had the room as dark as it could be so that the stars would show more brightly. my window is about 20 feet from the neighbors backyard fence. on the other side of their fence are their trees. i could hear a single cricket chirping and that was the only sound i remember hearing. around 1 to 1:15 am i seen an object traveling from east to west in the sky. i noticed it because i had been watching the stars and they don't move and i rarely see birds or bats flying around our house at night. the object was not as high in the sky as the neighbors treetops. it did not glow or give off any sound. it looked like two solid used-penny colored spheres no bigger then large grapefruits. one was slightly ahead of the other. they looked attached in their center with a white cylinder shaped tube only about 2 inches in diameter. the white cylinder tube did not glow but somehow looked as though it was hollow. it only took about 5 seconds to enter and leave my view but it will always remain in my mind. i could only see about 20 feet to the east of my window and about 30 feet toward the west until the nights darkness hid everything. i then jumped up away from my window, walked out of my bedroom into the hallway then into the living room all the time my thoughts were spinning around in my head. i was thinking, did i really just see that, circlular objects don't fly, we aren't alone and what's going to happen next? i felt afraid and excited at the same time. i wish i had someone to tell so that i would know i wasn't going crazy but then again they would probably think i was crazy. i then tried to collect my thoughts. i thought i better write this down so that i will never forget. luckily, i have never forgotten.
content.summary: Two,used penny colored spheres that looked conjoined with dull white tube. flying below treetop level about 12 feet from me from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the gym in parker, colorado on a dark long stretch of road and a bright flashing object caught my attention.  the object was zig zagging across the sky at incredible speeds.  it was in one position and then a split second later was miles away at a different level.  i continuously observed this very odd motion for several minutes pulled over on the side of the road.  the object appeared disk shaped and was definitely not an airplane because it moved from point to point instantly and there were airplanes flying in the sky for perspective.
content.summary: A bright flashing red and blue light emitting disk that zig zagged at incredible speeds miles at a time

content.detailedDescription: Green orb shot out of the sky way too fast to be manmade. after about 3 secs it disappeared.It just disintegrated. it is also crystal clear skys. i grew up here and i can recognize different types of aircrafts. my friend also witnessed the same thing!
content.summary: Green orb shooting out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to the back of,my house to have a smoke with my wife and looked up to the sky to see the stars and a star just started moving pretty fast across the sky. i have been seeing this for quite sometime now not sure what they are but every now and again i see stars moving across the sky., as well as other things this has been going on for years now lately it's been more since i've moved to new jersey from miami
content.summary: Star started moving quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at approx 3.00am, used the restroom and was looking out of a large window which has a view of cotton lake and beyond to trinity bay in chambers county, i noticed lights approaching over the lake from the southeast. the lights 10 to 20 were configured in a cigar shaped line,  moving rapidly, heading in a northwest direction. at first i thought it may be a group of helicopters, we often see helicopters doing night maneuvers in this area. as the lights got closer i realized that they were not helicopter or aircraft lights. the lights were white/blue and varied continously in intensity and position in the line, it was hard to judge how far away the object or objects were from me, there was no sound associated.I last saw the lights as they pasted on the northeast side of my home.

i wondered if i was seeing a meteor shower, but the sighting lasted about 30 seconds and was not moving as rapidly as i would expect for meteor, it also appeared to be close
content.summary: 10+ lights strung in a line heading from se to nw,no sound, lights intensity and positions varied continuously

content.detailedDescription: I am a over the road truck driver. i picked a load up in amorillo tx. and was going to salt lake city ut. i was taking a short cut north on state hwy 191 (i think thats rihgt) but i was headed north into utah out of arizona. as i was climbing a hill.I saw a bright light come out of the sky towards me. as it got closer to me i noticed that i could see thru it. when it got within 30 feet or so from me and my truck it darted to the right(east) and i lost sight of this (orb)light. it was a beutiful day with plenty of sunshine.For early december and this light was brighter than rest of its surroundings.I was so shocked by seeing this i pulled to the side of the road after topping the hill and set there wondering what i just saw. later that evening when i was driving in southern utah by green river i saw 2 red lights . one after the other shoot across the sky. that was weird too.
content.summary: This orb or light came from the north and  desend or flew by me and darted to the right

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a smoke around 8:15 p.M. on 2/26/2013 and noticed what appeared to be landing lights from an aircraft. depending on the direction of the wind, commercial aircraft fly directly over my house on final approach. since this occurs on a daily basis, i didn't give it a lot of thought. the light dimmed and went out, as though it passed through a cloud. again, i really didn't think that much of it due to the frequency. i glanced away for only a moment and when i returned to the original position,the light was present again. but much brighter this time. again, i dismissed it as a commercial airliner. there were no aircraft in the area. period. i watched the light for a few seconds and it, for the lack of a better word, "spawned" another light. now there are two objects at the same altitude that seemed to hover in the air with no detectable lateral movement. i was intrigued by this and continued to watch the lights. perhaps 10 seconds elapsed and each light simultaneously "spawned" another light. one to the left and one to the right. now there are four objects. two slightly higher and outboard of the original lights. another five or six seconds later, they "spawned" yet again for a total of six lights. three on the left and three on the right that appeared to form right triangles. i watched the formation for maybe 10 seconds as it moved slightly to my right and then disappear. i watched the sky for about five minutes longer, but the objects did not reappear. i was exhilarated but perplexed. i wanted to get my daughter outside to see this, but she was in the shower and could not hear me calling. i hope to see these lights again!!!
content.summary: Observed single light, then multiple lights in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south along i35 outside purcell, ok when object appeared in the sky in front of our vehicle. object appeared to be a straight object with two white lights one in front and one in the back. it began performing aerial stunts and making patterns in the sky mostly figure eight pattern my daughter tried taking a picture but object at this point was to far in the distance. one of the lights blinked out remaining light started to blink as it moved out toward the east and hovered out of our view. about 40 minutes later while still traveling south along i35 just south of paul's valley, ok my daughter had a strange look on her face i asked if she was ok she said yes just had what she described as a rush of panic when she looked up at me i noticed her face had a look of almost shock i looked outside the drivers window to the east to see an sphere object with a white light almost like a window with a red arch above the white hovering right along side the car. the moment i noticed it it shot out in front of the vehicle back toward the south and changed shape to a triangle with 3 lights 1 white 1 red and 1 blue. at this point the object again started performing aerial stunts and making patterns before changing shape again to a solid light and moving back east at this point it was close enough my daughter was able to get photos it changed again once it slowed down back to the triangle shape and started hovering out of our sight. after it was no longer in our view my daughter checked her pictures to discover that two of three photos appeared to be smiley faces in the sky while the third is two straight lines parallel to each other.
content.summary: Object in sky performing aerial designs to our south moves to the east begins hovering. 40 min later object is seen hovering to east outside of car shoots back to south changing shape and light paterns performs more aerial designs before moving back east

content.detailedDescription: I work night shift in calera al, at about 4:30am on 2/27/13 i was standing outside work taking a smoke break and looking up west slightly nw at the sky as i'm a bit of an astronomy buff. first i noticed the object or light and thought star or planet but the only planet visible at this time is saturn but from where i was standing it was behind me and it's view blocked by the building. anyhow, i quickly dismissed a planet or star when i noticed the object was moving. it was moving at a slow enough pace that my next thought was airplane and the distance was about right. this is where it gets strange, within 10-15 sec of thinking airplane the object or light started to get smaller moving away, but not away like a plane would more like out into space, it continued to get smaller till it just faded away. this whole event took place in 25-30 sec from the time i noticed it till it disappeared. did anyone else see this?
content.summary: First i thought it was a star or planet till i noticed it moving. it was to far away for a detailed description.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard and i looked behind my uncles house and saw a bright light cylender shape rise up and fly away. my cousin and best friend also witnessed this strange event.
content.summary: Creepy and frieghting
